title: Calories in Shredded Cheddar Cheese
meta_description: Discover calories in shredded cheddar cheese per serving, including full nutrition breakdown, protein, fat, carbs, and easy tweaks for your meals.
assumptions: Standard full-fat cheddar cheese, shredded; mild or sharp variety; no additives; 28 g serving (about 1 oz or 1/4 cup).
disclaimer: Nutrition varies by brand, fat content, aging process, and portion accuracy. Check labels for precise values.

quick_answer.text: 28 g of shredded cheddar cheese contains about 113 kcal and 7 g protein.

label_note: Totals mirror Nutrition Facts labels for easy comparison with packaging.

tweaks.label: Add 1 tsp grated parmesan per 28 g

faqs.q: How many calories in 1 oz shredded cheddar cheese?
faqs.a: About 113 kcal for 28 g of standard shredded cheddar.

faqs.q: What's the protein in shredded cheddar cheese?
faqs.a: Around 7 g protein per 28 g serving.
Very lowâ€”only 0.4 g carbs per 28 g, with 0 g fiber.

faqs.q: How much fat is in shredded cheddar cheese?
faqs.a: Approximately 9.3 g total fat per 28 g, including 5.4 g saturated.

faqs.q: Is shredded cheddar high in sodium?
faqs.a: Yes, about 174 mg per 28 g serving; opt for low-sodium if watching intake.
